tweet:
Yesterday morning I met with community leaders from #Monsey & Ramapo then joined @SenGillibrand for a round table discussion on the growing anti-Semitism epidemic. 

We cannot turn a blind eye to the rise in hatred we see in this country. We won’t accept this as the new normal. pic.twitter.com/KN0R03ew6h
On @CNN momentarily to talk about the recent anti-Semitic attacks in #Monsey and other news of the day. pic.twitter.com/CRIE8K7CnV

My friend @repjohnlewis is an American hero. He’s faced many tough fights in his remarkable life, and the whole country is standing with him as he faces this one. 

I can’t wait to see you back on the House floor, John. https://twitter.com/repjohnlewis/status/1211661167728480256 …
About to join @brikeilarcnn on @CNNSitRoom to discuss the latest on #Impeachment and the rise in Anti-Semitism that must be combated here in America. @CNNPolitics @CNN pic.twitter.com/SwLAebBzUw

I have no doubt about why the president allowed the assistance to go forward. He got caught.

⬇️ Read about how President Trump and his Administration withheld critical assistance to Ukraine to pressure their government to interfere in our elections. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/12/29/us/politics/trump-ukraine-military-aid.html?smid=nytcore-ios-share …

I’m alarmed by the Government of Zambia's refusal to work with Amb. Foote for his honest assessment of the discrimination faced by the #LGBTQ+ community. 

#HumanRights are a core value of U.S. diplomacy regardless of Embassy leadership.
Thank you, Enes. https://twitter.com/EnesKanter/status/1211319023213973504 …

My heart goes out to my friends in #Monsey who endured yet another terrible anti-Semitic attack yesterday. 

Anti-Semitism is an epidemic that is on the rise and must be defeated. 

We cannot accept this as the new normal.  https://bit.ly/2sxdFXz  pic.twitter.com/kbSKz63INL

This is very encouraging news! Congrats to the @32BJSEIU workers for fighting hard and #BuildingJustice! #UnionStrong @SEIU https://twitter.com/32BJSEIU/status/1208119387279880192 …

Proud to have my bipartisan Poison Center Network Enhancement Act signed into law as part of H.R. 1865. This is a victory for #NY16, and will help combat crises like the #OpioidEpidemic and deadly complications associated with #Vaping pic.twitter.com/66OmSEQUvd

I’m deeply disappointed with the ruling just now in Texas v. United States, a Republican led effort to dismantle the #ACA. @HouseDemocrats will continue fighting for common sense legislation that expands coverage and protects those with pre-existing conditions. #ProtectOurCare https://twitter.com/NBCPolitics/status/1207423415948337155 …

The President’s actions have left us no choice. He abused the power of his office to help his chances of reelection. 

Why is this conduct so serious?

Corrupting an American election—particularly w/help from a foreign power—means corrupting American democracy.

We must #Impeach. pic.twitter.com/UmlD6FhZsD

Feedback from #NY16 today is overwhelming:
 
“Thank you for defending our democracy.” 
“The President put himself above the law.” 
“This man has made a mockery of our laws & norms.” 
“The evidence is clear.” 
“Please protect our country.” 
“Vote FOR Impeachment.” 
 
I'm with you

I stand with the 20k+ @32BJSEIU office cleaners who are fighting for a fair contract with the wages and benefits they deserve. 

The men and women of labor should share in the prosperity they help to create! 

We need to fight for #BuildingJustice and #StrongCommunities. https://twitter.com/32BJSEIU/status/1205249040952287233 …

I am pleased that the House just passed my bill providing funding for #PoisonControlCenters like the NYC Poison Control Center, which are on the front-lines of fighting public health crises like the #opioid and #vaping epidemics. Learn more here:  https://aapcc.org/

A friendly reminder that @HouseDemocrats have been working hard #ForThePeople:

✅Lower Healthcare Costs 
✅Higher Wages 
✅Tougher Gun Laws

What has @senatemajldr been doing? pic.twitter.com/UW5EfkBoFD

Pleased to work with @USAIDMarkGreen to secure $10 million in new funding for disaster resilience in Eastern and Southern #Caribbean under #USCaribbean2020 legislation I authored. https://twitter.com/USAIDMarkGreen/status/1206786511108218881 …

Leader @SenSchumer is right to demand a fair trial should #impeachment reach the Senate. 

It’s outrageous that @SenateMajLdr is colluding with the President to rig the process. Jurors and defendants aren’t on the same team. https://twitter.com/ThePlumLineGS/status/1206363330312638464 …
After Poway, Pittsburgh, and now Jersey City, we must channel our pain and heartbreak into a renewed commitment to fight intolerance and hatred. https://twitter.com/ADL/status/1205185550443044870 …

Now this is grassroots activism.

Despite the wind and cold, hundreds came out today in #Westchester to support @HouseDemocrats work on #impeachment.  

When asked if we had a republic or monarchy, Ben Franklin responded "A republic, if you can keep it."

We intend to keep it. pic.twitter.com/XvggonlNTq
A few photos from last night’s #CB12 Holiday Party in the #Bronx. We had a great time, thank you George for the warm reception (and nice jacket!) pic.twitter.com/GCib5uyHNp

Today marks 7 years since #SandyHook. 

Today also marks 290 days since @HouseDemocrats passed #HR8, universal background checks. 

@senatemajldr has done nothing for 290 days. He's done nothing for 7 years. 

But we won't stop fighting #ForThePeople. #SandyHookPromise

I’m grateful to @BradSherman for his long-time leadership on the Foreign Affairs Committee, and I’m glad that @RepBera and @JoaquinCastrotx, two of our most capable members, are assuming these new leadership positions. https://twitter.com/HouseForeign/status/1205538814321659907 …
Congratulations to #Ardsley student Gillian Gold, winner of the 2019 #NY16 #CongressionalAppChallenge for her app. WWW (Wonders of World Water)! @CongressionalAC

Today marked the 4th anniversary of the #ParisAgreement. How about you work to solve the #climatecrisis instead of bullying a teenager? #BeBest https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1205100602025545730 …

Enough is enough. Americans are sick & tired of paying more for their prescriptions than people in other countries. I'm proud to have just voted for H.R.3, the #LowerDrugCosts Now Act, which ensures Americans will not pay more for lifesaving drugs than other developed countries. pic.twitter.com/AvqW4gT8aB

Today I joined my colleagues on the #SafeClimateCaucus to intro a resolution recognizing the 4th anniversary of the #ParisClimateAgreement. Despite continued denials from #Trump and the #GOP, we must show the world that we are still firmly committed to the goals of the agreement.

Nearly 58 million Americans have been unable to pay for a prescription drug at least once in the last 12 months. We must do better. I'm proud to support #LowerDrugCosts Now Act that will allow negotiations and bring relief to NY families. https://twitter.com/SpeakerPelosi/status/1205141772080472065 …

Well deserved. 

We asked @gretathunberg to come speak before the @houseforeign committee earlier this year on #climatechange. 

Her testimony was poignant & her message was simple: just listen to the scientific community. 

Science, and facts, matter. https://twitter.com/TIME/status/1204743717132914688 …
As a Member of the Pro Choice Caucus, I will continue to fight policies that threaten the immense progress we’ve made in expanding access to #reproductive services.

#SCOTUS has refused to take up a case on Kentucky’s forced narrated ultrasound law. 

This unconstitutional law serves no purpose other than trying to shame and stigmatize women seeking an abortion. @PPFA @PPMHVAction @PPact @ChoiceMatters https://twitter.com/ACLU/status/1204095051560701959 …

The facts are uncontested that the President abused his office and threatened our national security to cheat in the 2020 election — then he obstructed Congress’s exercise of its constitutional impeachment powers. #ArticlesOfImpeachment https://twitter.com/HouseJudiciary/status/1204452362192064517 …

ICYMI: the FBI does not complete hundreds of thousands of gun background checks each year. This cannot stand. If Republicans cared about guns falling into the wrong hands, the @SenateGOP would act on #HR8 and #HR1112 to ensure this does not continue. https://www.rollcall.com/news/congress/fbi-gun-checks …

As I said on the House floor yesterday in support of #HR4, the right to vote is sacred. We must push for stronger voter protections, fight against voter ID laws & voter roll purges, & work to keep polling locations from closing.  I’m proud to help pass HR4 today. #RestoreTheVOTE pic.twitter.com/pgSg6ENdzv

Good to hear my colleague @BennieGThompson is investigating this apparent abuse. 

Hundred-million dollar contracts should not be doled out based on who said the nicest things about POTUS publicly.
